title: Wind Cave National Park: Species Table
body: Seed Study - Species Table       For information on seed collection and processing or seedling identification of a species, click on the symbol in the appropriate column. If there is no symbol, we do not have that information for that species. A description of our seed collection and processing effort, including definitions of terms used for individual species entries, can be found here.          Species   Common Name   Origin   Growth Form   Seed Collection and Processing   Seedling Identification    Achillea millefolium common yarrow  native   forb   X   X    Amaranthus blitoides (Amaranthus graecizans) prostrate pigweed  exotic   forb       X    Ambrosia psilostachya western ragweed  native   forb       X    Amorpha canescens lead plant  native   shrub   X   X    Andropogon gerardii big bluestem  native   grass   X   X    Anemone cylindrica thimbleweed  native   forb   X   X    Aristida purpurea red three-awn  native   grass   X   X    Artemisia frigida fringed sagewort  native   subshrub   X   X    Artemisia ludoviciana white sage;
